Text: After extracting with 7z and launching AlienShooter.exe, error message appears: "Unable to Locate Component. This application failed to start because d3dx9_27.dll was not found. Re-installing the application may fix this problem." Same message appeared after extracting and launching again. I am running XP SP3 and meet hardware requirements described in Readme.txt. Any suggestions?
Thanks to Redundantos for uploading this, and to bibo115 for .dll fix (which fixed everything)
I don't know about anyone else but I can't see my mouse at all when I play
